text: "...Baby One More Time" is the first single for Britney Spears released off her first album as its first single. It went to number one on the Billboard Hot 100. The video was memorable for Spears being dressed in a schoolgirl uniform. The song was mostly written by Max Martin. It was originally pitched to the R&B; group TLC but they turned it down. == Other websites == * "...Baby One More Time" on YouTube * == References == Category:Britney Spears songs Category:1998 songs
title: ...Baby One More Time (song)
